text: @EnvAgency perhaps reducing cost would help fly tipping. The disposal costs are ridiculous atm!

Watching #Panorama about the #FlyTipping How can the @EnvAgency sit there and say they are tackling serious crime when every street you go down is full of rubbish these days?  Also councils charging for waste now is the cause for the increased problem.
@EnvAgency @EmmaViner Oh dear oh dear Emma
@EnvAgency what a useless spokesperson on tv tonight. She should be ashamed and have the courage to say what she feels not what shes is expected to say. Outrageous and such a disappointing jobsworth!
@EnvAgency @BBCPanorama Well done Panorama. Environment Agency you are failing. Every Govt department says we are investigating - its a cop out.

entity.name: Scandal
entity.description: Olivia Pope, a former media relations consultant to the president, is ready to move on with her life and opens her own crisis-management firm, but she can't seem to shake ties with her past. Pope's staff includes womaniser-turned-family man Stephen Finch, slick litigator Harrison Wright and hacker extraordinaire Huck. As she moves forward it becomes clear that while her staffers may specialise in cleaning up the lives of other people, they can't seem to do the same for themselves.

Where we have identified any third party copyright information you will need to obtain permission from the copyright holders concerned. urls.title: KS2 Flooding Lessons | The Flood Hub
urls.description: COMING SOON! The Flood Team at Newground have developed an education package containing a number of lessons and resources for schools and young people, which is set to launch in early 2021. The lessons will aim to increase young people‚Äôs knowledge on flooding and flood risk management and will be pitched at KS2 level (ages 7 to 11), although a lot of the material included can be adapted for other key stage levels. Each lesson pack will contain a PowerPoint lesson, a lesson plan with teacher‚Äôs notes, and
